sense.def:
A number
je beseda kot
two
,
nine
ali
eleven
ali znak kot 1, 3 ali 47. Z njimi povemo, o koliko stvareh govorimo ali na katerem mestu v nizu se nekaj pojavi.

seg.quote: He lives at number 19 New King Street.

sense.def:
One's number
je niz številk, ki jih zavrtimo, ko nekomu telefoniramo.

seg.quote: Ring me tomorrow. Here's my number.

sense.def:
Izraz
number
uporabljamo v povezavi z
large
ali
small
, če želimo približno povedati, koliko stvari ali oseb je nekje.

seg.quote: ...cities with large numbers of children in care.
A surprising number of men never marry.
They were produced in vast numbers.

sense.def:
A number of
pomeni več stvari ali oseb.

Any number of
pomeni veliko stvari ali oseb.

seg.quote: The work can be done in any number of ways.

sense.def:
Kadar skupina oseb ali stvari
numbers a particular amount
, jih je v skupini določeno število.

seg.quote: The force numbered almost a quarter of a million men.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
numbers something
, nečemu dodeli zaporedno številko in to številko napiše nanj.

seg.quote: I haven't numbered the pages yet.
